SEARCH
Package Inter.IntBishop

Interface IntBishop

All Known Implementing Classes:
Bishop, King, Queen
public interface IntBishop
Interface representing the behavior of a Bishop piece in a chess game.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final IntChessBoard
    chessboard
    Represents the chessboard on which the bishop moves.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    isValid(char N_LocationX, int N_LocationY)
    Checks if moving the bishop to the specified new location is a valid move.
    default boolean
    moveToBishop(char LocationX, char N_LocationX, int N_LocationY, int LocationY)
    Moves the bishop to the specified new location.

  • Field Details

    • chessboard

      static final IntChessBoard chessboard
      Represents the chessboard on which the bishop moves.

  • Method Details

    • moveToBishop

      default boolean moveToBishop(char LocationX, char N_LocationX, int N_LocationY, int LocationY)
      Moves the bishop to the specified new location.
      Parameters:
      LocationX - The current horizontal location of the bishop.
      N_LocationX - The new horizontal location of the bishop.
      N_LocationY - The new vertical location of the bishop.
      LocationY - The current vertical location of the bishop.
      Returns:
      true if the bishop can move to the new location, false otherwise.

    • isValid

      boolean isValid(char N_LocationX, int N_LocationY)
      Checks if moving the bishop to the specified new location is a valid move.
      Parameters:
      N_LocationX - The new horizontal location of the bishop.
      N_LocationY - The new vertical location of the bishop.
      Returns:
      true if the move is valid, false otherwise.
